platypusTutorial.diag1: I can't remember the last time there was ~4such a foolish human~0 before me
platypusTutorial.diag2: Are you here to make a wish, human?
platypusTutorial.diag3: You're a man of few words, I like that
platypusTutorial.diag4: Let me remind you of the requirements for me, Boonaburra, to grant your wish
platypusTutorial.diag5: You must possess the gem of ~5stubbornness~0, the gem of ~6strength~0, and the gem of ~7selfishness~0. They're all located in this temple.
platypusTutorial.diag6: Once obtained and brought before me, I can grant whatever you desire.
platypusTutorial.diag7: But remember: the wish must be utterly ~1selfish~0
platypusTutorial.diag8: No world peace, no resurrections. Only wishes for oneself. Wealth? Fame? What will you wish for, ~4foolish human~0?

platypus.diag1: Place the gems on these pedestals and then state your wish, ~4foolish human~0
platypus.diag2: ... is this truly your wish, ~4foolish human~0?

platypusFinale.diag2: You could have had anything, and you chose to go ~2back in time~0 to die right after?
platypusFinale.diag5: But one thing doesn't add up: what were all those little papers he insisted on retrieving?
platypusFinale.diag8: You wanted to go back in time to apologize to your partner and make sure she didn't die angry?
platypusFinale.diag10: ... ~1human~0, you have defeated me. You have earned this gift.
